name: Miss Spring Pomegranate 2019
description:
Photographing an over bloated celebration in an underwhelming town for an unpaid internship. You’re almost certain nothing could make your day worse.

Almost.

Content Warning: occult references; violence; light body horror; reading

* View in fullscreen for full experience | Scroll up and down through the text with the page up and page down keys *

᠃  ⚘᠂ ⚘ ˚ ⚘ ᠂ ⚘ ᠃  ⚘᠂ ⚘ ˚ ⚘ ᠂ ⚘ ᠃  ⚘᠂ ⚘ ˚ ⚘ ᠂ ⚘ ᠃ ⚘᠂ ⚘ ˚ ⚘ ᠂ ⚘ ᠃ ⚘᠂ ⚘ ˚ ⚘ ᠂ ⚘ ᠃

Note:  I tried something a little different for this one: unlike WGDitD, Miss Spring Pomegranate 2019 doesn't have visuals for each screen the character passes through. Feel free to leave a comment and write whether that adds to or subtracts from the immersion and atmosphere of the game.  

I'm deciding which visual route to go with for my third game and would love your feedback for those who played WGDitD — and even from those who haven't! Thanks~
